title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\StreamingRecognitionFeatures\VoiceActivityTimeout
name: VoiceActivityTimeout
description:
Events that a timeout can be set on for voice activity.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognitionFeatures.VoiceActivityTimeout

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.speech_start_timeout
params.description: Duration to timeout the stream if no speech begins. If this is set and no speech is detected in this duration at the start of the stream, the server will close the stream.

params.name: data.speech_end_timeout
params.description: Duration to timeout the stream after speech ends. If this is set and no speech is detected in this duration after speech was detected, the server will close the stream.

methods.name: getSpeechStartTimeout
methods.description:
